doc.title: Maven Repository
doc.content:
maven.repo.remote = http://apache.linuxforum.net/dist/java-repository,
			http://dist.codehaus.org, http://mirrors.sunsite.dk/maven,
			http://public.planetmirror.com/pub/maven,
			http://apache.justdn.org/java-repository,
			http://apache.freelamp.com/java-repository,
			http://apache.linuxforum.net/dist/java-repository,
			http://www.ibiblio.org/maven
